_inspectorSnowReport.Report: Mother Nature was busy last night! We received 6 inches of fresh snow overnight, with another 4-6 inches expected today. Moonbeam Express, Link, and the Magic Carpet are now open for the season, providing access to Same Street, Easy Street, and Lower Little Dollie. Due to early season conditions, we currently have no beginner terrain from Moonbeam. Respect all rope boundaries, control your speed, and keep your eyes peeled for other skiers and riders. Kids Ski Free Week kicks off today with free lift tickets for kids 12 and under, plus great deals on lessons, dining, lodging, and retail. Join us for the Ski Mountaineering World Cup taking place on lower Main Street today. View the action from outside Last Chance Lodge grab the shuttle from Moonbeam to get there. Parking reservations are required Friday - Sunday, including holidays before 11:00 a.m. Carpool with 4 or more to park for free. Park for free after 1:00 p.m. on reservation days. Enjoy a snowy Saturday on the hill!
